Had big hopes to love this but the shelf bra is too short for big busted girls. The material is lovely and very comfortable. Overall the fit was good. Bought sizing based on bra size (38DDD). Only issue is the shelf bra is too short. The girls were falling out underneath. If I moved them up, they were spilling out the top. This is such a comfortable and supportive sports bra. It is long enough to wear comfortably as a top in and outside of the gym. Not supportive enough for running but great for lifting and other low intensity workouts. I now have 2 of these and wear them all the time!
Size smaller than normal one.

I own a similar style crop tank from Lululemon, and honestly, I like this one even better! The material is super soft, breathable, and has just the right amount of stretch. I’m usually a small, and the sizing was spot on—fits perfectly without feeling too tight or restrictive.  Compared to my Lululemon top, this one is slightly less compressive, which makes it more comfortable for all-day wear. While Lululemon offers more support for intense workouts, it also squeezes my lats a bit too much, causing some unflattering bulging. This top, however, provides great coverage and support without that issue. The U-back design is both stylish and functional, keeping everything in place while still looking flattering.  Overall, this is an amazing dupe at a fraction of the price! Perfect for workouts, lounging, or even dressing up with jeans. I love it so much that I’m already planning to buy more colors! Highly recommend!

I ordered a size medium in this top and the fit was tight. I am a little busty but my normal top size ranges from small to medium so I was a little disappointed when it didn’t fit right. I am 5,4 and 172lbs for reference.  The color was as shown and it is beautiful. The material was also quality and felt really nice, almost buttery soft. It has built in pads which can be removed also.  Overall it seems like a great product, even though I returned it due to sizing. If you order it I suggest ordering 1 size up!
